name: Triple S Holdings Limited
description: Developer of personal hygiene products intended for a simple and effective hygiene routine for men. The company specializes in making deodorant with anti-antiperspirant properties that get absorbed quickly, do not cause allergic reactions, and prevent bad odors, providing customers with male hygiene products, and accessories to cleanse, moisturize, and deodorize and form a simple male grooming routine and prevent health and order issues.
one_liner: Developer of personal hygiene products intended for a simple and effective hygiene routine for men. The company specializes in making deodorant with anti-antiperspirant properties that get absorbed quickly, do not cause allergic reactions, and prevent bad odors, providing customers with male hygiene products, and accessories to cleanse, moisturize, and deodorize and form a simple male grooming routine and prevent health and order issues.
